question_text: What is the first step to force restart an unresponsive iOS device?
answer_options: Hold the power button and volume button for 10 seconds
Connect to a computer and use iTunes
Wait for the battery to drain completely
correct_answer: Hold the power button and volume button for 10 seconds
explanation: Most iOS devices require holding the power button and another button (home or volume) for 10 seconds to force a reset when the device is unresponsive.
